title: Online Bible Education: Leadership-Based Advanced Learning Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Christian doctrines and introductory biblical knowledge
context.additional_context: Business administration/leadership job-linked biblical education course. Mobile-optimized content to address limited technological environments

learning_goals: Learners can write and perform five or more role-play scenarios applying biblical texts to modern leadership situations.
Learners can submit three or more analysis reports on virtual church/mission fields through online field studies.
Learners can analyze ten or more religion-related websites based on website credibility evaluation criteria.
Learners pass an assessment of argumentation skills using biblical perspectives in discussion simulations (80% or higher).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
